PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ElectricDistributionPointCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: A room or a place or a box where an electrical supply enters and is then further distributed via electrical circuits. A distribution point may be a main distribution point or a sub-main distribution point.

PropertyDef.Name: IsMain
PropertyDef.Definition: Identifies if the current instance is a main distribution point or topmost level in an electrical distribution hierarchy (= TRUE) or a sub-main distribution point (= FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: CaseMaterial
PropertyDef.Definition: Material from which the casing surrounding the distribution point is constructed.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfOpenings
PropertyDef.Definition: Maximum number of openings that can fit with the case for normal use. In the openings there must be nipples, so cable may run through.
